metadata.description: Exported all commands and workflows: team-shared

deploy-prod.name: deploy-prod
deploy-prod.command: kubectl apply -f k8s/production/ && kubectl rollout status deployment/app

deploy-staging.name: deploy-staging
deploy-staging.command: kubectl apply -f k8s/staging/ && kubectl rollout status deployment/app-staging

steps.name: Check Pod Status
steps.description: Check the status of all pods in production namespace

steps.name: Get Recent Logs
steps.description: Get the most recent 50 log entries from the app

steps.name: Check Node Status
steps.description: Get detailed information about cluster nodes
